// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.mdl-textfield__input
  padding-top: 12px
  padding-bottom: 12px

.mdl-textfield__label
  font-size: 20px
  top: 30px
  &:after
    top: 31px
    bottom: auto

.textfield__helptext
  font-size: $font-size-small - 1px
  font-weight: $font-weight-thin
  display: block
  margin-top: 6px
  color: $color-grey-medium

// --------------------------------------------------
.textfield--full-width, #edit-submit
  width: 100%

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------

// States

.mdl-textfield--floating-label.is-dirty

    font-size: $font-size-small
    color: $color-blue-medium
    &:after
      background-color: $color-blue-medium
      top: 57px !important

.mdl-textfield--floating-label.is-invalid
  .mdl-textfield__input
    border-color: #a0a1a2
  .mdl-textfield__label
    font-size: $font-size-small
    color: #a0a1a2
    &:after
      background-color: #a0a1a2

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.alert
  position: relative
  padding: 20px 60px
  margin-bottom: 40px
  +border-radius(4px)

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.alert__icon
  position: absolute
  top: 50%
  left: 5px
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  color: #fff
  +icon-size(50px)

.alert__message
  color: #fff

.alert__close
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  color: #000
  opacity: 0.4
  +icon-size(50px)

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.alert--error
  background-color: $color-error

.alert--warning
  background-color: $color-warning

.alert--info
  background-color: $color-info

.alert--success, .alert--status
  background-color: $color-success

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter
  margin-bottom: 15px
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 8px
    vertical-align: top
    &:last-of-type
      margin-right: 0

.filters
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter__label,
.filter__term,
.filter__icon
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.filter__term
  color: $color-orange

.filter__icon
  position: relative
  top: 1px
  +icon-size(20px)

.filter__dropdown-toggle
  font-size: 14px
  position: relative
  border: none
  outline: none
  background: none
  .filter__label
    color: $color-orange

.filter__dropdown
  display: none
  margin-top: 15px
  padding: 30px
  background-color: #fff
  .filters
    margin-bottom: 0

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.filters--solutions
  margin-top: 30px
  margin-bottom: 10px

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__header
  .filter
    font-size: $font-size-base
    display: inline
    margin-bottom: 0

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter__dropdown-toggle
  &.is-active
    &:before
      position: absolute
      bottom: -30px
      left: 50%
      display: block
      width: 0
      height: 0
      content: ''
      transform: translateX(-50%)
      border-right: 12px solid transparent
      border-bottom: 12px solid #fff
      border-left: 12px solid transparent

.filter__dropdown
  &.is-active
    display: block

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu
  display: none
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    display: -webkit-flex
    display: -ms-flexbox
    display: flex

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu__link
  line-height: 60px !important
  position: relative
  display: block
  width: 170px
  padding: 0 12px 0 0 !important
  text-align: center
  text-decoration: none
  text-transform: uppercase
  border-top: 2px solid transparent
  border-bottom: 2px solid transparent

.header-menu__wrapper
  text-align: center

.header-menu__icon
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle
  +icon-size(50px)

.header-menu__text
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  display: inline-block
  text-align: left
  vertical-align: middle

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu__link.active-trail, .header-menu__link.is-active
  color: $color-blue-default
  background: #fff
  border-top: 2px solid $color-orange
  opacity: 1

$waat-icons-font-path: '../../images/fonts/waat-icons'

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")

.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  display: inline-block
  line-height: 100%
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

// Modifiers

.icon--solution:before
  content: '\e7c4'

  content: '\e7a4'

  content: '\e61b'

  content: '\e668'

.icon--download:before
  content: '\e7b9'

.icon--error:before
  content: '\e663'

.icon--warning:before
  content: '\e65c'

.icon--info:before
  content: '\e905'

.icon--success:before
  content: '\e618'

.icon--close:before

.icon--draggable:before
  content: '\e854'

.icon--search:before

.icon--menu:before
  content: '\e601'

.icon--arrow-down:before

sections.description: Listing may contains various types of tiles presented below. Size of the tile can be modified thanks to mdl-cell--X-col class, where X specifies the column size for the cell.
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  position: relative
  background: #fff

.listing__card
  position: static

.listing__image
  position: relative
  height: 140px
  text-align: center
  img
    position: relative
    top: 50%
    width: auto
    max-width: 100%
    height: auto
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%)
    -ms-transform: translateY(-50%)
    transform: translateY(-50%)

.listing__metadata,
.listing__wrapper
  padding: 20px

.listing__field
  margin-bottom: 10px

.listing__title,
.listing__title a
  font-size: 16px
  font-weight: 600
  margin: 0
  text-decoration: none
  color: $color-blue-dark

.listing__teaser
  font-size: 14px
  font-weight: 300
  margin: 0
  color: $color-grey-medium
  p
    margin-bottom: 0

.listing__stats
  position: absolute
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  width: 100%
  padding: 0 10px
  text-align: right

.listing__stat
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.listing__icon,
.listing__text
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.listing__icon
  color: lighten($color-grey-medium, 10%)
  +icon-size(26px)

.listing__text
  position: relative
  right: -4px
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  color: $color-blue-default

.listing__header
  margin-top: 30px
  margin-bottom: 30px

.listing__block-title
  display: inline-block
  margin: 0
  vertical-align: middle

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--separated
  margin-top: 40px
  border-top: 1px solid $color-grey-light

.listing__image--default
  background-color: #f0f7f7
  .icon
    position: absolute
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
    color: #5d5e5f
    +icon-size(90px)

.listing__card--inline-containers
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    display: table
  .listing__metadata,
  .listing__image
    +breakpoint(mobile)
      display: table-cell
      vertical-align: middle
  .listing__image
    +breakpoint(mobile)
      min-width: 220px
      img
        position: absolute
        top: 50%
        left: 50%
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%)

.listing__card--stats-container
  .listing__metadata
    padding-bottom: 40px

.listing__fields--bottom-aligned
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    position: absolute
    right: 20px
    bottom: 20px
    left: 20px
  .listing__field:last-of-type
    margin-bottom: 0

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__title
  .icon
    position: relative
    top: 7px
    +icon-size(32px)

.listing__card--detail-container
  .listing__title
    font-size: $font-size-small
    text-decoration: underline
    color: $color-orange
  .label,
  .value
    font-size: $font-size-xsmall
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: middle
  .label
    width: 60px
    margin-right: 10px
    text-align: right

// Listing

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab
  background-color: $color-grey-light

.tabs
  border-bottom: 1px solid $color-grey-light

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab 
  a
    color: $color-base
    text-decoration: none
    &:hover,
    &:focus,
    &:active
      color: $color-orange

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab--horizontal
  border-bottom: 1px solid $color-grey-light

.tabs--content-type
  margin: 30px 0
  border-bottom: 1px solid darken($color-grey-light, 5%)
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    display: flex
    flex-wrap: nowrap
    justify-content: space-between
    align-items: flex-start
    text-align: center
    border-bottom: none
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
    margin: 40px -60px 0 -60px

.tab--content-type
  position: relative
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    margin-bottom: 30px
    &:last-of-type
      margin-bottom: 0
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    width: 30%
    height: 100px
    margin-right: 5%
  @media (min-width: 700px)
    width: 25%
    margin-right: 0
  .tab__icon
    color: lighten($color-grey-medium, 10%)
    position: absolute
    top: -12px
    left: -18px
    +icon-size(80px)
  .tab__text
    margin-bottom: 15px
    padding-left: 60px
  .tab__text--upper,
  .tab__text--lower
    text-align: left
  .tab__text--upper
    font-size: 32px
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.tab--more
  position: relative
  text-align: center
  margin-top: 25px
  text-decoration: none
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, tablet)
    margin-bottom: 25px
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    width: 90px
    height: 100px
  .tab__text,
  .tab__icon
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: middle
    color: $color-orange
  .tab__text
    font-size: $font-size-small
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  .tab__icon
    +icon-size(25px)

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  .tab--more
    position: absolute
    right: -40px
    bottom: -140px
    display: block
    width: 120px
    height: 40px
    padding: 0
  .tab--more-wrapper
    top: 50%

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab--horizontal.is-active
  border-bottom: 1px solid #fff
  background-color: #fff
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

.tab--content-type.is-active
  position: relative
  border-bottom: 2px solid $color-orange
  .tab__icon
    color: $color-base
  &:after
    content: ""
    position: absolute
    right: 0
    left: 0
    bottom: -6px
    margin: 0 auto
    width: 0
    height: 0
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    border-top: 4px solid $color-orange

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  padding: 0
  background-color: transparent

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__release
  padding: 0
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    padding-bottom: 30px
    &:last-of-type
      padding-bottom: 0
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    &:last-of-type
      padding-bottom: 160px
.timeline__release-progression
  position: relative
  margin: 0
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    width: 100%

.timeline__release-info
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 40px 50px 0 0
    text-align: right
  .release__info-element
    display: inline-block
    margin: 0 5px 20px 0
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      display: block
      margin-right: 0
      margin-bottom: 10px

.timeline__release-bar
  display: none
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    position: absolute
    top: 0
    right: 20px
    display: block
    width: 4px
    height: 110%
    background-color: $color-grey-light
    &:before
      position: absolute
      top: 38px
      left: 50%
      display: block
      width: 18px
      height: 18px
      content: ''
      transform: translateX(-50%)
      border: 4px solid $color-grey-bg
      background-color: $color-grey-light
      +border-radius(50%)

.timeline__release-content
  position: relative
  margin: 0
  padding: 20px 10px
  background-color: #fff
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    width: 100%
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 20px 0 0 20px
  &:before
    position: absolute
    top: 20px
    left: -12px
    display: none
    width: 0
    height: 0
    content: ''
    border-top: 12px solid transparent
    border-right: 12px solid #fff
    border-bottom: 12px solid transparent
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      display: block

.timeline__meta
  margin-right: 30px
  margin-left: 30px

.timeline__release-title
  margin: 0 0 10px 0

.timeline__release-abstract
  color: $color-grey-medium

.timeline__listing-block-title
  margin: 0 30px 30px 30px

.timeline__listing
  overflow: hidden

.timeline__listing-item
  overflow: hidden
  margin: 0 30px 10px 30px
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 0 0 10px 0
    padding: 20px 30px
    background-color: #f0f7f7

.timeline__listing-title
  float: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    float: none
    margin-bottom: 10px

.timeline__listing-details
  float: right
  margin-left: 10px
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    float: none
    margin-left: 0
  .value
    +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
      font-size: $font-size-small

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__release
  &.is-latest
    .timeline__release-progression
      overflow: hidden
    .timeline__release-content
      margin-top: 0
    .timeline__release-info
      margin-top: 22px
    .timeline__release-bar
      top: 20px
      background-color: $color-blue-slider
      &:before
        top: -1px
        border-color: $color-grey-bg
        background-color: $color-blue-slider

// --------------------------------------------------
.alert

  padding: 20px 60px
  margin-bottom: 40px
  +border-radius(4px)

  position: absolute
  top: 50%
  left: 5px
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  color: #fff
  +icon-size(50px)

.alert__message
  color: #fff

.alert__close
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  color: #000
  opacity: 0.4

.alert--error
  background-color: $color-error

.alert--warning
  background-color: $color-warning

.alert--info
  background-color: $color-info

.alert--success, .alert--status

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter
  margin-bottom: 15px
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 8px
    vertical-align: top
    &:last-of-type
      margin-right: 0

.filters
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter__label,
.filter__term,
.filter__icon
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.filter__term
  color: $color-orange

.filter__icon
  position: relative
  top: 1px
  +icon-size(20px)

.filter__dropdown-toggle
  font-size: 14px
  position: relative
  border: none
  outline: none
  background: none
  .filter__label
    color: $color-orange

.filter__dropdown
  display: none
  margin-top: 15px
  padding: 30px
  background-color: #fff
  .filters
    margin-bottom: 0

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.filters--solutions
  margin-top: 30px
  margin-bottom: 10px

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__header
  .filter
    font-size: $font-size-base
    display: inline
    margin-bottom: 0

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.filter__dropdown-toggle
  &.is-active
    &:before
      position: absolute
      bottom: -30px
      left: 50%
      display: block
      width: 0
      height: 0
      content: ''
      transform: translateX(-50%)
      border-right: 12px solid transparent
      border-bottom: 12px solid #fff
      border-left: 12px solid transparent

.filter__dropdown
  &.is-active
    display: block

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu
  display: none
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    display: -webkit-flex
    display: -ms-flexbox
    display: flex

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu__link
  line-height: 60px !important
  position: relative
  display: block
  width: 170px
  padding: 0 12px 0 0 !important
  text-align: center
  text-decoration: none
  text-transform: uppercase
  border-top: 2px solid transparent
  border-bottom: 2px solid transparent

.header-menu__wrapper
  text-align: center

.header-menu__icon
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle
  +icon-size(50px)

.header-menu__text
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  display: inline-block
  text-align: left
  vertical-align: middle

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.header-menu__link.active-trail, .header-menu__link.is-active
  color: $color-blue-default
  background: #fff
  border-top: 2px solid $color-orange
  opacity: 1

$waat-icons-font-path: '../../images/fonts/waat-icons'

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")

.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  display: inline-block
  line-height: 100%
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.icon--solution:before
  content: '\e7c4'

.icon--collection:before
  content: '\e7a4'

.icon--event:before
  content: '\e61b'

.icon--news:before
  content: '\e70b'

.icon--business-case:before
  content: '\e7c6'

.icon--user:before
  content: '\e746'

.icon--message:before
  content: '\e77b'

.icon--like:before
  content: '\e758'

.icon--plus:before
  content: '\e668'

.icon--download:before
  content: '\e7b9'

.icon--error:before
  content: '\e663'

.icon--warning:before
  content: '\e65c'

.icon--info:before
  content: '\e905'

.icon--success:before
  content: '\e618'

.icon--close:before
  content: '\e65a'

.icon--draggable:before
  content: '\e854'

.icon--search:before
  content: '\e653'

.icon--menu:before
  content: '\e601'

.icon--arrow-down:before
  content: '\e60f'

.icon--share:before
  content: '\e66d'

.icon--load:before
  content: '\e862'

.icon--location:before
  content: '\e678'

.icon--out:before
  content: '\e860'

// File mime icons:
.icon--mime-default:before
  content: '\e63c'

.icon--mime-doc:before
  content: '\e63d'

.icon--mime-exe:before
  content: '\e643'

.icon--mime-gif:before
  content: '\e887'

.icon--mime-jpg:before
  content: '\e644'

.icon--mime-pdf:before
  content: '\e641'

.icon--mime-png:before
  content: '\e642'

.icon--mime-ppt:before
  content: '\e886'

.icon--mime-rar:before
  content: '\e63f'

.icon--mime-xls:before
  content: '\e63e'

.icon--mime-zip:before
  content: '\e640'

.icon--inline
  top: 0
  margin-top: 0

section.description: Listing may contains various types of tiles presented below. Size of the tile can be modified thanks to mdl-cell--X-col class, where X specifies the column size for the cell.
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  position: relative
  background: #fff

.listing__card
  position: static

.listing__image
  position: relative
  height: 140px
  text-align: center
  img
    position: relative
    top: 50%
    width: auto
    max-width: 100%
    height: auto
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%)
    -ms-transform: translateY(-50%)
    transform: translateY(-50%)

.listing__metadata,
.listing__wrapper
  padding: 20px

.listing__field
  margin-bottom: 10px

.listing__title,
.listing__title a
  font-size: 16px
  font-weight: 600
  margin: 0
  text-decoration: none
  color: $color-blue-dark

.listing__teaser
  font-size: 14px
  font-weight: 300
  margin: 0
  color: $color-grey-medium
  p
    margin-bottom: 0

.listing__stats
  position: absolute
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  width: 100%
  padding: 0 10px
  text-align: right

.listing__stat
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.listing__icon,
.listing__text
  display: inline-block
  vertical-align: middle

.listing__icon
  color: lighten($color-grey-medium, 10%)
  +icon-size(26px)

.listing__text
  position: relative
  right: -4px
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  color: $color-blue-default

.listing__header
  margin-top: 30px
  margin-bottom: 30px

.listing__block-title
  display: inline-block
  margin: 0
  vertical-align: middle

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--separated
  margin-top: 40px
  border-top: 1px solid $color-grey-light

.listing__image--default
  background-color: #f0f7f7
  .icon
    position: absolute
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
    color: #5d5e5f
    +icon-size(90px)

.listing__card--inline-containers
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    display: table
  .listing__metadata,
  .listing__image
    +breakpoint(mobile)
      display: table-cell
      vertical-align: middle
  .listing__image
    +breakpoint(mobile)
      min-width: 220px
      img
        position: absolute
        top: 50%
        left: 50%
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%)

.listing__card--stats-container
  .listing__metadata
    padding-bottom: 40px

.listing__fields--bottom-aligned
  +breakpoint(mobile)
    position: absolute
    right: 20px
    bottom: 20px
    left: 20px
  .listing__field:last-of-type
    margin-bottom: 0

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__title
  .icon
    position: relative
    top: 7px
    +icon-size(32px)

.listing__card--detail-container
  .listing__title
    font-size: $font-size-small
    text-decoration: underline
    color: $color-orange
  .label,
  .value
    font-size: $font-size-xsmall
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: middle
  .label
    width: 60px
    margin-right: 10px
    text-align: right

// Listing

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab
  background-color: $color-grey-light

.tabs
  border-bottom: 1px solid $color-grey-light

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab 
  a
    color: $color-base
    text-decoration: none
    &:hover,
    &:focus,
    &:active
      color: $color-orange

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab--horizontal
  border-bottom: 1px solid $color-grey-light

.tabs--content-type
  margin: 30px 0
  border-bottom: 1px solid darken($color-grey-light, 5%)
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    display: flex
    flex-wrap: nowrap
    justify-content: space-between
    align-items: flex-start
    text-align: center
    border-bottom: none
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
    margin: 40px -60px 0 -60px

.tab--content-type
  position: relative
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    margin-bottom: 30px
    &:last-of-type
      margin-bottom: 0
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    width: 30%
    height: 100px
    margin-right: 5%
  @media (min-width: 700px)
    width: 25%
    margin-right: 0
  .tab__icon
    color: lighten($color-grey-medium, 10%)
    position: absolute
    top: -12px
    left: -18px
    +icon-size(80px)
  .tab__text
    margin-bottom: 15px
    padding-left: 60px
  .tab__text--upper,
  .tab__text--lower
    text-align: left
  .tab__text--upper
    font-size: 32px
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.tab--more
  position: relative
  text-align: center
  margin-top: 25px
  text-decoration: none
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, tablet)
    margin-bottom: 25px
  @media (min-width: 600px)
    width: 90px
    height: 100px
  .tab__text,
  .tab__icon
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: middle
    color: $color-orange
  .tab__text
    font-size: $font-size-small
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  .tab__icon
    +icon-size(25px)

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  .tab--more
    position: absolute
    right: -40px
    bottom: -140px
    display: block
    width: 120px
    height: 40px
    padding: 0
  .tab--more-wrapper
    top: 50%

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.tab--horizontal.is-active
  border-bottom: 1px solid #fff
  background-color: #fff
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

.tab--content-type.is-active
  position: relative
  border-bottom: 2px solid $color-orange
  .tab__icon
    color: $color-base
  &:after
    content: ""
    position: absolute
    right: 0
    left: 0
    bottom: -6px
    margin: 0 auto
    width: 0
    height: 0
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    border-top: 4px solid $color-orange

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  padding: 0
  background-color: transparent

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__release
  padding: 0
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    padding-bottom: 30px
    &:last-of-type
      padding-bottom: 0
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    &:last-of-type
      padding-bottom: 160px
.timeline__release-progression
  position: relative
  margin: 0
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    width: 100%

.timeline__release-info
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 40px 50px 0 0
    text-align: right
  .release__info-element
    display: inline-block
    margin: 0 5px 20px 0
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      display: block
      margin-right: 0
      margin-bottom: 10px

.timeline__release-bar
  display: none
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    position: absolute
    top: 0
    right: 20px
    display: block
    width: 4px
    height: 110%
    background-color: $color-grey-light
    &:before
      position: absolute
      top: 38px
      left: 50%
      display: block
      width: 18px
      height: 18px
      content: ''
      transform: translateX(-50%)
      border: 4px solid $color-grey-bg
      background-color: $color-grey-light
      +border-radius(50%)

.timeline__release-content
  position: relative
  margin: 0
  padding: 20px 10px
  background-color: #fff
  +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
    width: 100%
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 20px 0 0 20px
  &:before
    position: absolute
    top: 20px
    left: -12px
    display: none
    width: 0
    height: 0
    content: ''
    border-top: 12px solid transparent
    border-right: 12px solid #fff
    border-bottom: 12px solid transparent
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      display: block

.timeline__meta
  margin-right: 30px
  margin-left: 30px

.timeline__release-title
  margin: 0 0 10px 0

.timeline__release-abstract
  color: $color-grey-medium

.timeline__listing-block-title
  margin: 0 30px 30px 30px

.timeline__listing
  overflow: hidden

.timeline__listing-item
  overflow: hidden
  margin: 0 30px 10px 30px
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    margin: 0 0 10px 0
    padding: 20px 30px
    background-color: #f0f7f7

.timeline__listing-title
  float: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    float: none
    margin-bottom: 10px

.timeline__listing-details
  float: right
  margin-left: 10px
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    float: none
    margin-left: 0
  .value
    +breakpoint(sm-mobile, mobile)
      font-size: $font-size-small

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------

// Dependiencies
// --------------------------------------------------

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__release
  &.is-latest
    .timeline__release-progression
      overflow: hidden
    .timeline__release-content
      margin-top: 0
    .timeline__release-info
      margin-top: 22px
    .timeline__release-bar
      top: 20px
      background-color: $color-blue-slider
      &:before
        top: -1px
        border-color: $color-grey-bg
        background-color: $color-blue-slider
